@theheresy  Thank you! Got to the first scene and was thinking how the girls's genitalia is so ugly drawn but would power through if there was at least a good story. Now I know not worth my time lol.
All in all, this is worthless no matter which angle you approach it from.

(cont'd) Then some outsiders apparently discover the events, but only one is actually not a class member. Convenient. But she's ALSO a sister. Super convenient. Somehow these girls sleeping with MC as well is too much for Class Pres (as if she were not arranging for an orgy with the girls every day anyway) and she decides this means there is no way to fight the plan. YOU WERE ACTIVELY PARTICIPATING IN IT YOU DUMB BITCH. Then, apparently resisting the father's plan to have them sleep together involves MC and Pres sleeping with each other. Everything is undone when it is eventually discovered that MC is not even the guy's son. As if he could arrange for all those artificial inseminations and for them to all be in the same class, but never used a simple DNA test to see if the one male involved was actually descended from him.

This was hot garbage. In an attempt to include a scene with every girl in the page limit, most girls get a single page. The girls that did get more than just one page stay in one position in which there really is no appearance of thrusting at all, so either way there is nothing enjoyable. Cannot even enjoy their personalities because nobody is developed at all. The story is retarded as well. Apparently the father's plan is to have MC impregnate all or one of the girls in the class, who are also supposed to be his sisters. So the plan to resist his plot is for the Class President to arrange for MC to sleep with as many girls as possible, as if that is not exactly the father's plan. We then have a gauntlet of sex scenes that are each woefully short and what we are given has nothing particularly arousing unless just the idea of penetration is all you need to get off.
